title: Chicken Soup for the Soul: Laughter Is the Best Medicine: 101 Feel Good Stories
description: If laughter is the best medicine, then this book is the prescription. At a time when so much of what we see and read makes us feel bad, Chicken Soup for the Soul's editors chose the 101 craziest, most embarrassing, and most hilarious stories from thousands of submissions. These feel-good stories will bring a smile to your face, make you laugh out loud and brighten your day.In laughter, we often capture the funniest, if not the best, moments of our lives. In these 101 true, relatable stories, Chicken Soup for the Soul contributors share what got them laughing so hard that they couldn't stop. Imagine a group of friends sharing their funniest stories with you --  in a package you can hold in your hands.
author: Amy Newmark
